General.Name: Hiecise Precision Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Hiecise Precision Equipment Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automatic high-precision CNC rolling grinders in China and internationally. The company offers roll and cylindrical grinders, as well as metal rolled products, including metal plates, metal belts, and metal foils for applications in machinery and equipment, automobile, shipbuilding, home appliance, power equipment, high-speed rail locomotives, construction, aerospace, textile, and paper industries. Hiecise Precision Equipment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Kunshan, China.

1.Name: Ms. Caiying  Xu
1.Title: CFO, Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
